title: Emerald & Diamond Grand Haaram with South Sea Pearl Drops
materials: 9 pcs). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Classic Haaram design featuring intricate filigree work set with dazzling diamonds. A central floral motif is accentuated by two pear-shaped ruby, flanked by green Emeralds to catch the light. Delicate South Sea pearl drops add a touch of timeless elegance. The necklace features a zig-zag design with interspersed diamonds
colors: with vibrant green emeralds and lustrous white pearls creating a rich and sophisticated color palette.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaaham)
and milestone celebrations like Seemantham. Also suitable for upscale events and parties.
description: This majestic Haaram is a true heirloom piece, crafted with the finest materials and impeccable artistry. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, and South Sea pearls creates a captivating statement that will be treasured for generations. Its unique blend of traditional South Indian design and modern sophistication makes it a truly special investment. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance.
